p: Starkly contrasting cannabis-induced AMI, emerging data explore a multifactorial role of MC in the treatment of UA and CAD via modulation of the ECS, CB 1, and CB 2. Altered expression of the CB 1 and CB 2 receptors has been demonstrated in the myocardium of mice, as well as in human cell culture, for models of cardiovascular disease, CHF, and ischemic insult.
